response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. This product, which I am confident you will find invaluable, is currently valued by me at $1,200,000. My proposal to you is to offer this exceptional asset at a price of $1,350,000. I believe this price strikes a fair balance between reflecting the true value of the product and providing you with an attractive investment opportunity.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, I am more than happy to provide you with detailed insights and demonstrations. I am confident that once you understand the full potential of this product, you will see its immense value and be eager to make it part of your collection or operations.

Thank you for considering my offer. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
